title: Master Sciences et Techniques - Ingénierie Electrique et Systèmes Embarqués
description: This program aims to provide a comprehensive education covering electrical, electronic, and embedded systems. It trains engineers and high-level specialists in electrical engineering and embedded systems, focusing on electric motorizations, energy management in vehicles, automotive technologies, industry tools, artificial intelligence, computer systems, and more.
opportunities: Conception de circuits électroniques et leur programmation
Conception, programmation et mise en œuvre des systèmes électroniques embarqués
Développement pour les véhicules électriques, autonomes et intelligents
Electric Traction Motors and Control Systems
Les laboratoires de recherches des secteurs public et privés
Les entreprises de recherche et développement
access_conditions: Admission to this Master's program in Sciences and Techniques is based on a review of the applicant's file and through a competitive exam. It is open to holders of a bachelor's degree in the relevant field or an equivalent recognized diploma that meets the admission criteria specified by the program's academic team.
